Entry.JapaneseText: なんだかこの街、薄暗いな……
Entry.EnglishText: What's up with this town being so gloomy...

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカは年間の三分の一くらい、 霧に閉ざされてます。
Entry.EnglishText: Balka is blanketed with a layer of fog for about a third of the year.

Entry.JapaneseText: それに雨の日も多いっていうヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: And it rains a lot, too.
Entry.Notes: Uuh... I-I can't stand this! This town doesn't suit me at all!
